title: Just You and Me

en: Hey, #NAME. Mind taking the night off of work to talk? We've both been so busy, I feel like I haven't connected in ages.

no_caption: Let's try to have breakfast together, maybe?

en: This was fun! Things have been so stressful. It was nice to hangout and remember what it's like to be normal.
All right. Yeah, I understand. You're just trying to give whatever you can give.
